name: Mafia Pruh!
description: Mafia Pruh! is a brazilian Visual Novel that tells the story of Ren Nakamura a shy student who declares his love for Akemi Yamada. Akemi agrees to go out with him on the weekend. Ren comes back home happy and stumbles on a pigeon. Later that night, Ren wakes up and see some mafia-dressed pigeons above him threatening his life. After that, his life goes crazy.
